channel.title: Data Engineering on
channel.description: Recent content in Data Engineering on

item.title: What is Data Engineering?
item.description: What is Data Engineering? Data Engineering is a relatively new field in data-related topics. When we are talking about data folks, we usually think about two types of responsibilities inside the team: those who analyze the data those who prepare the data for analysis In the first category there are Data Analysts, Data Scientist, Data Visualization specialists, Product Analysts, etc. In the second category there are more technical people: Data Engineers, BI developers, DevOps/DataOps.

item.title: Building a Real-Time Stock Market Data Pipeline with Apache Kafka and Cassandra
item.description: Building a Real-Time Stock Market Data Pipeline with Apache Kafka and Cassandra In today’s fast-paced financial markets, the ability to process and analyze real-time data is crucial. I recently embarked on a project to build a real-time stock market data pipeline using Apache Kafka and Cassandra. This project not only enhanced my understanding of distributed systems but also provided valuable insights into handling high-volume, time-sensitive data. Project Overview The goal was to create a system that could:
